The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 01 September is 2,969 (343.6 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 28 August, there were 45 new confirmed cases (5.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 21 August, there were 53 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 15% (8 fewer cases).
